Name: WarpPod
Notes: A warp pad that teleports the player between this and another linked instance. It is also possible to hide the model entirely. In SMG1, some teleporters are unlocked using Grand Stars, however, this functionality is deprecated in SMG2. Furthermore, the colored paths do not exist in SMG2 anymore.

Obj_arg0.Name: Camera ID
Obj_arg0.Description: The camera ID used to retrieve the proper camera configuration.

Obj_arg1.Name: Visibility
Obj_arg1.Description: Can be used to hide the model.

Obj_arg2.Name: Useless
Obj_arg2.Description: Read but never used for anything.

Obj_arg3.Name: Paired Activation
Obj_arg3.Description: Specifies if the teleporter can be used already of if the paired teleporter needs to be activated first.

Values.Notes: Can be used without further requirements
Paired teleporter needs to be activated first

Obj_arg4.Name: Required Grand Stars
Obj_arg4.Description: The number of Grand Stars required for activation. Deprecated in SMG2.

Obj_arg5.Name: Activation Time
Obj_arg5.Description: The time in frames it takes for the activation camera cutscene to finish when the teleporter activates for the first time.

Obj_arg6.Name: Color
Obj_arg6.Description: The color to be used for the glow effect and path. Default corresponds to setting it to 0.

Obj_arg7.Name: Appearance
Obj_arg7.Description: Specifies if the path should emerge from this teleporter when the object appears.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Camera.Description: Used when the player teleports towards this object.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: Can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.
